rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0010
rows.name: ...While Void had me trapped,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0020
rows.name: I got a glimpse of his past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0030
rows.name: Long ago...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0040
rows.name: he was born as a citizen of Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0050
rows.name:
He was a certified genius, obsessed with
studying the "ultimate matter"—the Conduit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0060
rows.name: Distilling its power into six cores, he crafted the Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0070
rows.name: But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0080
rows.name: in doing so, he also stirred up the Ghosts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0090
rows.name: The Samaarians saw Void as the culprit,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0100
rows.name:
destroying the Ares and confining Void's mind
in a prison in the rift between worlds,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0110
rows.name: forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0120
rows.name: Mira's new continent, Volitaris—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0130
rows.name:
that was Void's prison,
spat out from the Rift when he escaped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0140
rows.name: Locked up alone in that interminable limbo,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0150
rows.name: he embraced solitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0160
rows.name:
What chafed at him more was the "ignorance"
it forced upon him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0170
rows.name: Abiding in a world without end,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0180
rows.name: Void wanted to know death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0190
rows.name: Not on account of any feeling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0200
rows.name: He simply, guilelessly, wanted to know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0210
rows.name: One day,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0220
rows.name:
a fissure appeared in the cage that held
Void's consciousness in stasis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0230
rows.name: It wasn't clear why.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0240
rows.name:
Perhaps his prison deteriorated with time,
or maybe it was a ripple from another world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0250
rows.name: Whatever the reason, Void's mind was sprung from its cell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0260
rows.name: And then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0270
rows.name: it manifested in the universe that held Elma's homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0280
rows.name:
His body was gone, but he had a vessel,
built for him by the hands of those that worshipped him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0290
rows.name: The Vita became Void made flesh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0300
rows.name: He went on to produce the Ganglion,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0310
rows.name: and used them as a force to help him "know death."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0320
rows.name:
First, he began by rallying his army to Elma's planet,
hoping to reclaim the Ares for himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0330
rows.name: But Void's movements, and the restored Ares—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0340
rows.name: both contributed to the Ghosts' reappearance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0350
rows.name:
The clash between Ganglion and Ghosts led to
the destruction of Elma's world,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0360
rows.name: along with its universe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0370
rows.name:
But even faced with that much death,
he did nothing to try and comprehend it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0380
rows.name: He simply realized something, instinctively.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0390
rows.name: He was afraid that he himself might disappear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0400
rows.name: And so, he ran away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0410
rows.name: From Samaar's descendants, the Ghosts...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0420
rows.name:
From all the forces that wanted to erase him,
he ran, and ran...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0430
rows.name:
and at the end of his long road,
he knew death for the first time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0440
rows.name: As he died,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0450
rows.name: I wonder what he was thinking...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG9010
rows.name: But, I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG9020
rows.name: Where will I go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG9030
rows.name: AAARRRGHHH!!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0490
rows.name: Hey...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0500
rows.name: Guys? You there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0510
rows.name: I, uh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0520
rows.name: I, kinda...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0530
rows.name: figured something out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0540
rows.name: That place...wasn't a prison at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0550
rows.name: I'm thinkin' it might've been a path straight to heaven.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0560
rows.name: It exists...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0570
rows.name: And boy is it a wonderful place...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0580
rows.name: Thank goodness...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0590
rows.name: Holy smokes, you're alive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0600
rows.name: Good work out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0610
rows.name: We thought we lost you, asshole![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0620
rows.name: I knew it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0630
rows.name: I was sure you'd get back to us somehow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0640
rows.name: Well, that one less worry on plate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0650
rows.name: Welcome back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0660
rows.name: Aw man, this is great, really.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0670
rows.name: I'd completely lost hope...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0680
rows.name: How could you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0690
rows.name: I can't believe you gave up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0700
rows.name: N-no, it's not like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0710
rows.name: Oh yeah, then what is it like?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0720
rows.name: Er, I, uh, I mean...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0740
rows.name:
What he's trying to say is that he's happy
you didn't get hurt, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0750
rows.name: In other words, sticks and stones make you stronger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0760
rows.name: Uh...no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0770
rows.name: Aha ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0780
rows.name: Okay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0790
rows.name: Here's our new world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33860100_MSG0800
rows.name: Right on cue.[ST:wait ]
